desc: Callum Robson is an Australian professional surfer. He debuted on the World Surfing League Championship Tour in 2022. Callum is making waves in his first ever season, taking out some of the biggest names in the sport like Mick Fanning on his way to ringing the runners up bell at Bells Beach.

layout.text: "The area I grew up in has been ravaged by unprecedented flooding twice. I'm launching a global raffle to raise much needed funds to help my community get back on their feet." Callum Robson
